import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{createReview}from'../services/api';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ResultPage=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const{isAuthenticated}=useAuth();const[saving,setSaving]=useState(false);const[saved,setSaved]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[autoSaveAttempted,setAutoSaveAttempted]=useState(false);const{movieTitle,reviewText,rating,sentiment,detailedSentiment,confidence}=location.state||{movieTitle:'',reviewText:'',rating:5,sentiment:'',detailedSentiment:'',confidence:0};// Display the detailed sentiment if available, otherwise use the base sentiment
const displaySentiment=detailedSentiment||sentiment;// If no review text, redirect back to home
useEffect(()=>{if(!reviewText||!movieTitle){navigate('/');}},[reviewText,movieTitle,navigate]);// Check if review length is valid
useEffect(()=>{if(reviewText&&reviewText.trim().length<10){setError('Review text must be at least 10 characters long.');}},[reviewText]);// Define handleSaveReview with useCallback to avoid dependency issues
const handleSaveReview=useCallback(async function(){let isAutoSave=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;if(!isAuthenticated){navigate('/login',{state:{from:window.location.pathname}});return;}setSaving(true);setError('');try{// Save the review with the sentiment already analyzed
await createReview({movieId:"placeholder-id",// You would normally get this from actual data
movieTitle,reviewText,rating});setSaved(true);// Only redirect automatically if it's a manual save
if(!isAutoSave){setTimeout(()=>navigate('/dashboard'),1500);}}catch(err){console.error('Error saving review:',err);setError(err instanceof Error?err.message:'Failed to save review');}finally{setSaving(false);}},[isAuthenticated,movieTitle,navigate,rating,reviewText]);// Auto-save review if authenticated
useEffect(()=>{if(!autoSaveAttempted&&isAuthenticated&&reviewText&&movieTitle&&sentiment&&!error){handleSaveReview(true);setAutoSaveAttempted(true);}},[isAuthenticated,reviewText,movieTitle,sentiment,error,autoSaveAttempted,handleSaveReview]);const getSentimentColor=()=>{if(displaySentiment.includes('positive')){return'text-green-600';}else if(displaySentiment.includes('negative')){return'text-red-600';}else{return'text-blue-600';}};const getSentimentBgColor=()=>{if(displaySentiment.includes('positive')){return'bg-green-100';}else if(displaySentiment.includes('negative')){return'bg-red-100';}else{return'bg-blue-100';}};const formatConfidence=confidence=>{return Math.round(confidence*100)+'%';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.5},className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{initial:{y:20,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1},className:"bg-white rounded-xl p-8 shadow-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-purple-600 text-transparent bg-clip-text",children:"Sentiment Analysis Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-3 text-gray-700",children:"Movie"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 text-gray-800",children:[movieTitle," -
